# fast way to find invalid XML
```{sh}
find . -type f | xargs xmllint --noout 2>> ../errors3
for i in $(grep -P -o "\d+\.vrt" errors3 | uniq); do rm vrt5/$i; done
```

```{r}
foo <- getNestedElements(taz, corpus = "TAZ2", sourceDir = "vrt5", element = "text")
```
